name: Taxidermy Demo
description:
---DEMO---

Taxidermy is a first person horror experience, in this game you are locked in a house of a mad taxidermist and surviving is up to you!

---------------------------------------------------------------

The full game is still in Development, but In this demo you will play a hole new level that does not exist in the game. Play with the lights off and using headsets for a better experience!

--------------------------------------------------------------

I've been working in this game for 4~5 months now, and it's beeing develop 95% by only me. I'm from brazil and working with game dev. here is not a simple task, anyway thanks for taking a look at this page and hope you enjoy the Demo!

-------------------------------------------------------------

After Downloading just unzip the file, read the text files, then click the HORROR icon and enjoy!
